mapper.insert: insert into sample_school_professors (professor_id, professor_password, professor_name, professor_position, department_no) values (#{id},#{password},#{name},#{position},#{departmentNo})
mapper.select: select professor_id as id, professor_name as name, professor_password as password, professor_position as position, department_no as departmentNo from sample_school_professors where professor_id = #{value}
